```{r setup}
library(bmstate)
N_sub <- 300
```

# Basic survival model

## TransitionMatrix

```{r}
tm <- transmat_survival()
print(tm)
tm$plot()
```

## MultistateModel

```{r}
mod <- create_msm(tm)
print(mod)
```

## Simulation

```{r}
pd <- mod$simulate_data(N_sub)
pd$plot_paths()
pd$plot_graph()
```
